original_title: NBRO issues alert for landslides in three districts
original_body_lines: The National Building Research Organization (NBRO) today issued landslide early warnings for several areas in Badulla, Kandy and Kegalle districts.
Accordingly, a Level 1 (Yellow) warning has been issued for the Gangawata Korale Divisional Secretariat Division and its surrounding areas.

Since the rainfall within the past 24 hours has exceeded 75 mm, people living in the aforementioned area have been urged to be on alert about the possibility of landslides, slope failures, rock falls, cutting failures and ground subsidence.
